Movement and attacks are turn-based, requiring strategic planning to avoid hazards and efficiently clear levels. The game emphasizes resource management and precise timing to overcome obstacles and defeat foes.
1.brainman: In *Brainman*, players navigate a grid-based environment to push keys into doors, destroying both upon collision to unlock paths toward the exit. Keys are propelled in straight lines when collided with, stopping only when hitting another object or the door. Scattered gems provide score bonuses upon collection. The challenge lies in strategic movement to position keys effectively while avoiding obstacles. Gameplay emphasizes spatial reasoning and precise timing to clear paths and reach the goal.
1.defender: In *Defender*, the player defends a city from enemy forces. Enemies spawn on the right side of the screen, moving leftward while bombarding the city. The player must shoot these enemies before they reach the city, as their destruction results in failure. Ammo is periodically dropped from the top of the screen and must be collected to maintain firepower. If ammo runs out or enemies breach the city, the game ends.
